```{r}
# Create a function to calculate the standard error of a vector
     
```

```{r}
# Create a test vector
test_vector <- c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5)

#Create a function to calculate the standard error of a vector
standard_error <- function(x) {
  sqrt(var(x) / length(x))
}

# Test the function
standard_error(test_vector)
```
